mapper.select: SELECT SUBJECT.*,A.MEMBERNUM AS sj_num, TEACHER.tc_name FROM SUBJECT,TEACHER,(SELECT STUDENT.sj_idx,COUNT(MEMNUM) AS MEMBERNUM FROM (SELECT * FROM SUBJECT LEFT JOIN (SELECT sj_idx AS MEMNUM FROM REGIST)A ON SUBJECT.sj_idx=A.MEMNUM)STUDENT GROUP BY SJ_IDX)A WHERE SUBJECT.tc_idx=TEACHER.tc_idx AND SUBJECT.sj_idx=A.sj_idx
select distinct a.sj_idx,mem_hp,mem_name,mem_id,mem_birth from member, (select * from regist where sj_idx=#{sj_idx})a where member.mem_idx=a.mem_idx
select subject.sj_name, subject.sj_loc, subject.sj_sd, subject.sj_ed from (select * from teacher where teacher.tc_idx=#{tc_idx})a, subject where subject.tc_idx = a.tc_idx
select count(*) from subject where sj_ed>SYSDATE and tc_idx = #{tc_idx}
select count(*) from subject where SYSDATE>sj_ed and tc_idx = #{tc_idx}
